If the #DixieFire is not the biggest #Wildfire in #California history, it soon will be. The same senecio is playing out around the planet. We have broken more meteorological records this last year since record keeping began. #ClimateEmergency is NOW! What are you doing to help?

“We need to invest in prevention and restoration of our forests and all the things that we recognize are important for creating [#wildfire] resilience,” said Yana Valachovic @UCANR

[Earthview Wonders] No.1349: #Forestfire #wildfire in near #Antalya #Turkey. In July 2021, over a hundred wildfires began in the Mediterranean Region forests of Turkey, the worst ever in the country's history. The wildfires started in Manavgat, Antalya, on July 28, at 37°C. https://t.co/bx2vpn8aWJ

The estimated 6,000-acre #wildfire in western Nebraska’s Banner County that started last week is nearly extinguished. The fire is believed to have been started by a lightning strike. The flames threatened some homes but none were damaged. https://t.co/j7GFx05QuN  #Nebraska
